title: This Best Crypto Presale Can Cure Your FOMO After Solana’s Missed ICO [This Guide Explains How]
body: Early participation in groundbreaking blockchain projects often yields transformative returns in the dynamic world of cryptocurrencies. One of the most notable success stories is Solana’s ICO, which highlighted the potential of investing early in innovative technologies. Similarly, Qubetics is emerging as a promising project, offering a visionary approach to blockchain interoperability and scalability. This article delves into the missed opportunities of Solana’s ICO and the exciting potential of Qubetics. Qubetics: The Future of Autonomous Blockchain Ecosystems Qubetics has been established to address the growing demand for a decentralised, interoperable, and self-sufficient blockchain infrastructure. By integrating seamlessly with the Ethereum ecosystem, Qubetics sets a new standard for scalability, security, and user-centric features. This visionary project is designed to enhance the blockchain landscape by enabling interoperability across networks and fostering a truly decentralised Web3 ecosystem. The fragmented nature of the current blockchain environment limits the potential of decentralised applications and cross-chain transactions. Qubetics tackles these challenges by becoming a Web3-aggregated chain, unifying multiple networks into a cohesive framework. This approach enables seamless asset transfers, data sharing, and cross-chain functionality, unlocking the full potential of decentralised technologies for developers, enterprises, and users. Solana: A Missed Opportunity for Early Investors Solana’s ICO is a classic example of how early-stage investments in innovative projects can lead to extraordinary returns. Held in March 2020, the Solana ICO offered SOL tokens for $0.22. The project raised $25 million during this fundraising round, securing the resources to develop its high-performance blockchain platform. Fast-forward to today, Solana has established itself as one of the fastest and most scalable blockchains, with a growing ecosystem of decentralised applications (dApps), non-fungible tokens (NFTs), and decentralised finance (DeFi) projects. At its peak, the SOL token traded at over $250, representing an astonishing ROI for early investors participating in the ICO. Solana’s success can be attributed to its unique proof-of-history consensus mechanism, which allows the blockchain to process thousands of transactions per second with minimal fees. This scalability has positioned Solana as a key player in the blockchain space, driving adoption among developers and enterprises alike. It is understandable that those who missed the opportunity to invest in Solana’s ICO regret it. However, the cryptocurrency market is filled with new opportunities, and emerging projects like Qubetics present a chance to be part of the next wave of innovation. Qubetics: A Compelling Investment Opportunity Currently in Presale Phase 15, Qubetics offers an exceptional opportunity for early adopters. Each presale phase brings a 10% price hike, culminating in a 20% increase in the final stage. At this stage, $TICS tokens are priced at $0.0414, with over $8.5 million raised, 12,800+ holders, and 394 million tokens sold. The next phase is imminent, with a post-presale target price of $0.25 per token. Analysts predict that $TICS tokens could achieve $10 to $15 values following the mainnet launch. For investors entering this stage, this translates to an ROI of approximately 32,028.61% if the token reaches $10 and around 48,092.91% if it climbs to $15. Qubetics’ autonomous and decentralised infrastructure ensures self-sufficiency, positioning it as a transformative force in the blockchain. Qubetics is poised to drive innovation and adoption across the Web3 ecosystem by addressing interoperability challenges and providing scalable, secure solutions. The Synergy Between Vision and Execution Solana and Qubetics showcase the importance of visionary thinking in the blockchain industry. Solana’s success demonstrates how technological innovation and scalability can drive widespread adoption. On the other hand, Qubetics highlights the significance of addressing interoperability and creating autonomous blockchain ecosystems to unlock the full potential of decentralised technologies. Learning from Missed Opportunities The lesson for investors who missed out on Solana’s ICO is clear: identifying and investing in promising projects during their early stages can yield remarkable returns. While Solana’s ICO is a missed opportunity, projects like Qubetics provide a fresh chance to participate in the future of blockchain innovation. By addressing real-world challenges and offering compelling solutions, Qubetics is well-positioned to become a key player in the next wave of blockchain development. With its focus on interoperability, scalability, and user-centric design, Qubetics is more than just a cryptocurrency; it is a comprehensive ecosystem that bridges the gap between fragmented blockchain networks. Conclusion: Seizing the Next Big Opportunity The cryptocurrency market continues to evolve, offering new opportunities for those who missed out on past successes like Solana’s ICO. Qubetics stands out as a visionary project that addresses critical issues in the blockchain space, providing a unified and autonomous ecosystem for developers and users alike. For investors seeking to capitalise on the next transformative blockchain project, Qubetics offers an unparalleled opportunity. By participating in its presale, early adopters can position themselves to benefit from the project’s growth and avoid the regret of missing out on another landmark ICO. With its innovative solutions and strong growth potential, Qubetics is poised to shape the future of blockchain technology. title: Shiba Inu Price Declines, Sparking Interest in a Low-Cap Altcoin With AI and RWA Integration
body: The recent decline in Shiba Inu price has stirred a wave of interest among investors, particularly those seeking opportunities in the altcoin market. As Shiba Inu (SHIB) grapples with its fluctuating value, a new contender has emerged from the shadows, PropiChain (PCHAIN) , a low-cap altcoin that integrates artificial intelligence (AI) and real-world assets (RWA). This intriguing shift highlights the dynamic nature of altcoin investments and highlights the potential for substantial returns in the developing decentralized markets. Shiba Inu Price Takes a Hit Amid Whale Activity and Market Selloff The Shiba Inu price has faced significant headwinds in recent days, fueled by large-scale selloffs from crypto whales and a broader market downturn. Over the last 48 hours, the Shiba Inu price posted a 3% loss, joining the ranks of other meme coins that have struggled under the weight of bearish sentiment. A major transaction, highlighted by analytics firm Lookonchain, saw a whale offloading 250 billion SHIB tokens, valued at approximately $6 million, pushing the Shiba Inu price further into the red zone. This selloff marks a pivotal moment, as the whale in question had amassed a staggering 15.28 trillion SHIB tokens in 2020 for just $3,800, raking in $109 million in profits to date. Despite these challenges, Shiba Inu enthusiasts remain hopeful. Historical patterns suggest that meme coins, including Shiba Inu, could rebound strongly during altcoin seasons or broader market rallies, with analysts predicting potential highs of $0.0000998 by 2025. However, volatility remains a critical factor as the market awaits signs of a Shiba Inu price turnaround. PropiChain (PCHAIN): The Low-Cap Altcoin With AI and RWA Integration Amidst the current bear movement of the Shiba Inu price, PropiChain (PCHAIN) is making waves in the real estate sector. PropiChain is reshaping the global real estate industry with a groundbreaking decentralized platform integrating blockchain, artificial intelligence (AI), non-fungible tokens (NFTs), and the metaverse. Historically, real estate investing has been reserved for high-net-worth individuals due to steep capital requirements and geographic limitations. PropiChain dismantles these barriers by providing global access to real estate markets. One of PropiChain’s standout features is its use of NFT tokenization. PropiChain allows for swift and secure property transactions by converting physical properties into digital assets without the need for cumbersome documentation or intermediaries. This fractional ownership model also empowers investors to purchase shares of high-value properties, making real estate accessible to a broader audience while introducing liquidity to an otherwise illiquid asset class​. PropiChain’s AI capabilities redefine how investors approach the real estate market. With automated market predictions and valuation models, the platform enables users to make data-driven decisions with unparalleled accuracy. AI tools analyze historical sales data and economic indicators to provide predictive insights into market trends and price fluctuations, helping investors capitalize on opportunities while mitigating risks. For instance, PropiChain’s AI-powered virtual assistants guide users through complex processes like document preparation and legal compliance, ensuring a flawless and efficient experience. Through its metaverse integration, users can virtually explore properties, interact with 3D environments, and evaluate property features without needing physical visits. This feature bridges geographic gaps and improves the decision-making process by providing an immersive property exploration experience​. PropiChain employs blockchain’s decentralized ledger system, known as “Title Contract,” to assure the security and transparency of all transactions. This feature eliminates counterparty risks, fraudulent activities, and trust issues that plague traditional real estate systems. Additionally, smart contracts , audited by BlockAudit, automate lease agreements, rental payments, and renewals, reducing administrative burdens and ensuring timely agreement execution​. PropiChain minimizes transaction costs and accelerates the property transfer process by removing intermediaries. Why Invest in the PropiChain Altcoin Presale PropiChain’s altcoin presale is structured to reward early participants with significant returns on investment (ROI). The presale is divided into three rounds, each offering altcoins at progressively higher prices. Currently, it is in the second stage, offering altcoins at $0.011. The listing price on exchanges post-ICO is set at $0.032 per altcoin, representing a 900% increase from the current price. Early participants receive 20–25% bonus altcoins, with 50% unlocked at TGE and the rest vested over 10 weeks to guarantee long-term commitment. The PCHAIN altcoin provides flawless platform functionality, from purchasing property NFTs to accessing AI-driven insights. Early investors can participate in PropiChain’s presale, with altcoins offered at discounted rates across multiple rounds. Now listed on CoinMarketCap, participating in PropiChain’s presale allows investors to secure substantial financial gains while supporting a platform set to revolutionize real estate investment through the integration of AI and blockchain technology. While investors brace for a probable further Shiba Inu price drop, savvy investors are looking forward to PropiChain (PCHAIN) altcoin, which has a better utility value and market proposition. title: XRP Ledger Hints at Price Increase; Ethereum Outranks Bitcoin While Web3Bay Streamlines Online Shopping!
body: Online commerce, blockchain technology, and decentralized systems are seeing exciting changes, with Ethereum, Web3Bay, and XRP setting the pace. Ethereum’s adoption of a proof-of-stake model has drawn environmentally aware users, enhancing its function and leading to more long-term holders than Bitcoin. However, Web3Bay is transforming online shopping by removing middlemen providing user empowerment through blockchain-backed clarity and decision-making. At the same time, XRP Ledger’s increase in activity, propelled by RLUSD stablecoin use and key advancements, hints at possible price rises and greater network function. As Ethereum continues to be a major player in decentralized finance and XRP bolsters its system, Web3Bay is forging a distinct path in altering consumer shopping and financial behavior. Analysing Ethereum’s Growing HODLer Base In 2024, Ethereum saw a significant rise in long-term holders, surpassing Bitcoin in this measure. This increase largely comes from its switch to a proof-of-stake (PoS) consensus approach, which greatly cut its energy use and appealed to those conscious of the environment. Additionally, Ethereum’s vast network of decentralized apps (dApps) and smart contracts has increased its usefulness, attracting developers and companies. Moreover, decentralized finance (DeFi) platforms, primarily on Ethereum, have driven its uptake by delivering financial services such as lending and borrowing without middlemen. This has boosted confidence among investors, as seen in the growing number of HODLers. Analysts also foresee Ethereum reaching $10,000 due to technological improvements and rising interest from institutions. Furthermore, the expected launch of cryptocurrency ETFs could further enhance Ethereum’s attractiveness, cementing its status as a top player in digital finance. Web3Bay Transforms E-Commerce via Blockchain Imagine a place where online shopping is governed not by large corporations but by its own users. Web3Bay is turning this concept into reality by removing large middlemen, lowering costs, and placing control into the hands of users via blockchain technology. This system manages payments, contracts, and logistics efficiently and securely through smart contracts, enhancing transparency and efficiency. This decentralized platform not only saves money but also allows users to influence its direction. Through the 3BAY token, users do more than trade; they have a voice in its evolution. This includes governance rights that allow the community to direct the future of Web3Bay, turning it into more than just a shopping site but a user-driven ecosystem. Additionally, the crypto community is beginning to notice. With over 400 million crypto shoppers worldwide, Web3Bay is set to capture this expanding audience. For example, early backers have already seen returns as high as 4253% during the token’s presale. Even those who missed the early opportunities still have a chance to participate before the full launch. As Web3Bay prepares to take on major e-commerce platforms like eBay, it combines the convenience of online shopping with the benefits of blockchain. For crypto shoppers weary of hidden fees and data misuse, Web3Bay presents a refreshing alternative where they can shop, save, and influence a future they help shape. This unique mix could soon make Web3Bay a leading name in the e-commerce revolution . XRP Ledger Enhances Crypto Transaction Efficiency The XRP Ledger is witnessing a surge in usage that may hint at potential price increases. Recently, the creation of new accounts has reached levels not seen since 2020, indicating a growing interest in the XRP ecosystem. Daily transactions have also soared to over 1.4 million, spurred by new functionalities and increased adoption of the platform. One significant factor in this growth is Ripple’s RLUSD stablecoin, which is fully supported by U.S. dollar deposits. RLUSD is gaining popularity on major exchanges like Uphold and Bitso, with plans for more integrations. The addition of Kenneth Montgomery, formerly of the Federal Reserve Bank, to the advisory board also enhances confidence in Ripple’s initiatives. Final Note! Ethereum, Web3Bay, and XRP each demonstrate the diverse potential of blockchain technology across finance, e-commerce, and digital ecosystems. Ethereum’s increase in long-term holders underscores its appeal as a sustainable and adaptable platform. The XRP Ledger’s rising activity, propelled by RLUSD and strategic developments, emphasizes its growing utility and potential market impact. Meanwhile, Web3Bay’s approach to e-commerce places power and control in the hands of its users, creating a marketplace that is shaped by its community. title: Musk’s Tesla Fire (MUSKFIRE) Memecoin to Surge Over 19,000% Before Exchange Listings, While Shiba Inu and Dogecoin Lag
body: Musk’s Tesla Fire could turn early investors into multi-millionaires, like Shiba Inu (SHIB) and Dogecoin (DOGE) did. Musk’s Tesla Fire (MUSKFIRE), a new Solana memecoin that was launched today, is set to explode over 19,000% in price in the coming days. This is because MUSKFIRE is set to soon be listed on numerous crypto exchanges, according to reports. This will give the Solana memecoin exposure to millions of additional investors, who will pour funds into the coin and drive its price up. Currently, Musk’s Tesla Fire can only be purchased via Solana decentralized exchanges, like Jup.ag and Raydium.io, and early investors stand to make huge returns in the coming days. Early investors in SHIB and DOGE made astronomical returns, and Musk’s Tesla Fire could become the next viral memecoin. Musk’s Tesla Fire launched with over $9,000 of liquidity, giving it a unique advantage over the majority of other new memecoins, and early investors could make huge gains. How to Buy To buy Musk’s Tesla Fire on Raydium.io or Jup.ag ahead of the CEX listings, users need to connect their Solflare, MetaMask or Phantom wallet, and swap Solana for Musk’s Tesla Fire by entering its contract address – HuyxQUYCfoVCBpNoS1LxC1kbQuajYW9EqEcKoJqtdS1C – in the receiving field. If you don’t have one of these wallets already, you can create a new wallet in a few minutes and transfer some Solana to it (which will then be used to buy the memecoin), from an exchange like Coinbase, Binance and many others. In fact, early investors could make returns similar to those who invested in Shiba Inu (SHIB) and Dogecoin (DOGE) before these memecoins went viral and exploded in price. If this happens, a new wave of memecoin millionaires could be created in a matter of weeks – or potentially even sooner. The Solana memecoin craze continues amid larger memecoins, like Shiba Inu (SHIB), Dogecoin (DOGE) and DogWifHat (WIF) trading sideways in recent weeks and losing momentum. This is why many SHIB, DOGE and WIF investors are instead investing in new Solana memecoins, like MUSKFIRE. Such memecoins have no utility and no inherent value, but investors looking for high gains have been investing in them due to their potential to rapidly rise in price.

title: Bitcoin Price Eyes Fresh Gains: Can Bulls Break Through?
body: Bitcoin price is recovering losses from the $91,400 zone. BTC is showing a few positive signs and might gain pace if it clears the $96,000 resistance zone. Bitcoin started a fresh recovery from the $91,400 zone. The price is trading above $92,500 and the 100 hourly Simple moving average. There is a connecting bullish trend line forming with support at $94,000 on the hourly chart of the BTC/USD pair (data feed from Kraken). The pair could start another increase if it stays above the $93,500 support zone. Bitcoin Price Starts Recovery Bitcoin price started a decent upward move above the $92,000 resistance zone. BTC was able to climb above the $93,200 and $93,500 resistance levels. The price was able to surpass the 50% Fib retracement level of the recent decline from the $96,040 swing high to the $92,588 low. There is also a connecting bullish trend line forming with support at $94,000 on the hourly chart of the BTC/USD pair. Bitcoin price is now trading above $94,000 and the 100 hourly Simple moving average . On the upside, immediate resistance is near the $95,250 level. It is near the 76.4% Fib retracement level of the recent decline from the $96,040 swing high to the $92,588 low. The first key resistance is near the $96,000 level. A clear move above the $96,000 resistance might send the price higher. The next key resistance could be $97,500. A close above the $97,500 resistance might send the price further higher. In the stated case, the price could rise and test the $98,800 resistance level. Any more gains might send the price toward the $99,500 level. Another Decline In BTC? If Bitcoin fails to rise above the $96,000 resistance zone, it could start a fresh decline. Immediate support on the downside is near the $94,000 level and the trend line. The first major support is near the $93,500 level. The next support is now near the $92,550 zone. Any more losses might send the price toward the $91,200 support in the near term. Technical indicators: Hourly MACD – The MACD is now gaining pace in the bullish zone. Hourly RSI (Relative Strength Index) – The RSI for BTC/USD is now above the 50 level. Major Support Levels – $94,000, followed by $93,500. Major Resistance Levels – $95,250 and $96,000.

This is a game-changer for individuals and businesses who need secure online access in places where internet freedom is restricted or where centralised services are vulnerable to attacks. The Qubetics ecosystem also integrates seamlessly with the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM), enabling it to interact with other blockchains and decentralised applications (dApps). This interoperability gives Qubetics the ability to cross bridges, linking networks and transferring assets across multiple blockchain systems. The robust architecture is set to drive scalability and security, making it an attractive choice for developers looking to build innovative solutions in the Web3 space. Decentralised VPN: Privacy and Freedom for the Digital Age For North American professionals and businesses looking for a secure, transparent way to browse the web, Qubetics’ dVPN offers a robust solution. By decentralising the VPN market, it removes the concerns of centralised control, which can often lead to privacy breaches or throttling. For entrepreneurs in North America, the ability to trade unused bandwidth and gain tokens can open new opportunities in the world of decentralised internet access. In regions where internet censorship or surveillance is prevalent, Qubetics’ solution empowers individuals to regain their privacy. Why Did This Coin Make it to This List? The Tron network is highly scalable, providing low-cost transactions with a focus on decentralising the entertainment and content-sharing industries. Render – Revolutionising Digital Content Creation Render (RNDR) is one of the most unique projects in the cryptocurrency space, allowing users to decentralise the process of rendering digital assets. Arbitrum – Scaling Ethereum for the Future Arbitrum is one of the most exciting Layer-2 solutions for Ethereum, focusing on increasing scalability while lowering transaction fees. By processing transactions off-chain and then settling them on Ethereum, Arbitrum enhances Ethereum’s ability to handle a larger volume of transactions without sacrificing decentralisation or security. Latest Developments: Arbitrum’s Adoption and Performance In 2024, Arbitrum has seen significant adoption from developers due to its low fees and fast transaction speeds. It has been integrated into multiple DeFi platforms, facilitating smoother, more efficient interactions. Bitcoin Cash – The Peer-to-Peer Digital Cash Bitcoin Cash (BCH) remains one of the most popular cryptocurrencies for peer-to-peer payments. As a hard fork of Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash was created to solve Bitcoin’s scalability issues and high transaction costs. The focus of Bitcoin Cash is to be a quick, cheap, and scalable alternative to traditional currencies, making it ideal for everyday transactions. Latest Developments: Bitcoin Cash Continues to Gain Adoption Bitcoin Cash has seen an increasing number of retailers and businesses accepting it for payments, particularly in Latin America and Southeast Asia. title: Ethereum Price Stays Resilient: A Gradual Increase in Sight?
body: Ethereum price started a fresh recovery wave from the $3,320 zone. ETH is consolidating and aims for a fresh increase above the $3,450 resistance. Ethereum started a decent recovery wave above the $3,350 zone. The price is trading above $3,365 and the 100-hourly Simple Moving Average. There was a break above a short-term declining channel with resistance at $3,350 on the hourly chart of ETH/USD (data feed via Kraken). The pair could gain bullish momentum if it clears the $3,450 resistance level. Ethereum Price Holds Support Ethereum price remained stable above the $3,250 level and started a fresh recovery wave like Bitcoin . ETH gained pace for a move above the $3,320 and $3,350 resistance levels. There was a break above a short-term declining channel with resistance at $3,350 on the hourly chart of ETH/USD. The pair surpassed the 50% Fib retracement level of the recent decline from the $3,444 swing high to the $3,310 low. Ethereum price is now trading above $3,365 and the 100-hourly Simple Moving Average. On the upside, the price seems to be facing hurdles near the $3,400 level. It is close to the 76.4% Fib retracement level of the recent decline from the $3,444 swing high to the $3,310 low. The first major resistance is near the $3,420 level. The main resistance is now forming near $3,450. A clear move above the $3,450 resistance might send the price toward the $3,550 resistance. An upside break above the $3,550 resistance might call for more gains in the coming sessions. In the stated case, Ether could rise toward the $3,650 resistance zone or even $3,720 in the near term. Another Decline In ETH? If Ethereum fails to clear the $3,400 resistance, it could start another decline. Initial support on the downside is near the $3,360 level. The first major support sits near the $3,320. A clear move below the $3,320 support might push the price toward the $3,250 support. Any more losses might send the price toward the $3,200 support level in the near term. The next key support sits at $3,120. title: Crypto Market Today January 2: Bitcoin Recovers, XLM Surges 26%, IOTA Rises 20%
body: Crypto market today showed bullish momentum as Bitcoin (BTC) crossed $95K after dipping to $92K. Stellar (XLM) emerged as the top gainer, surging 26% in the last 24 hours. IOTA followed with a 20% rise during the same period. Major altcoins like XRP and Cardano recorded gains of over 10% in the past 24 hours. Its 24-hour low and high were $0.33 and $0.45, respectively. The market cap increased by 28%, now standing at $13.16 billion. title: Musk’s Tesla Fire (MUSKFIRE) Solana Memecoin to Surge Over 19,000% Before Exchange Listings, While Shiba Inu and Dogecoin Lag
body: Musk’s Tesla Fire could turn early investors into multi-millionaires, like Shiba Inu (SHIB) and Dogecoin (DOGE) did. Musk’s Tesla Fire (MUSKFIRE), a new Solana memecoin that was launched today, is set to explode over 19,000% in price in the coming days. This is because MUSKFIRE is set to soon be listed on numerous crypto exchanges, according to reports. This will give the Solana memecoin exposure to millions of additional investors, who will pour funds into the coin and drive its price up. Currently, Musk’s Tesla Fire can only be purchased via Solana decentralized exchanges, like Jup.ag and Raydium.io, and early investors stand to make huge returns in the coming days. Early investors in SHIB and DOGE made astronomical returns, and Musk’s Tesla Fire could become the next viral memecoin. Musk’s Tesla Fire launched with over $9,000 of liquidity, giving it a unique advantage over the majority of other new memecoins, and early investors could make huge gains. How to Buy To buy Musk’s Tesla Fire on Raydium.io or Jup.ag ahead of the CEX listings, users need to connect their Solflare, MetaMask or Phantom wallet, and swap Solana for Musk’s Tesla Fire by entering its contract address – HuyxQUYCfoVCBpNoS1LxC1kbQuajYW9EqEcKoJqtdS1C – in the receiving field. If you don’t have one of these wallets already, you can create a new wallet in a few minutes and transfer some Solana to it (which will then be used to buy the memecoin), from an exchange like Coinbase, Binance and many others. In fact, early investors could make returns similar to those who invested in Shiba Inu (SHIB) and Dogecoin (DOGE) before these memecoins went viral and exploded in price. If this happens, a new wave of memecoin millionaires could be created in a matter of weeks – or potentially even sooner. The Solana memecoin craze continues amid larger memecoins, like Shiba Inu (SHIB), Dogecoin (DOGE) and DogWifHat (WIF) trading sideways in recent weeks and losing momentum. This is why many SHIB, DOGE and WIF investors are instead investing in new Solana memecoins, like MUSKFIRE. Such memecoins have no utility and no inherent value, but investors looking for high gains have been investing in them due to their potential to rapidly rise in price.

title: Analyst Predicts 260% Shiba Inu Price Rally, Here’s Why
body: Shiba Inu price is gaining attention as analysts suggest the token could see a 260% rally in the coming months. Following a bearish phase that saw Shiba Inu fall by more than 37% from its December highs, market analysts now believe the meme-inspired cryptocurrency may be poised for a strong recovery. Amid this consolidation phase, a whale has withdrawn $4.63 million worth of Shiba Inu from Binance, sparking speculation of a potential upward movement. SHIB Whale Activity and Resistance Levels A major transaction involving Shiba Inu has caught the attention of the crypto community. A whale, dormant for five months, withdrew 220 billion SHIB tokens worth $4.63 million from Binance. This significant move came amid Shiba Inu’s struggle to reclaim the $0.000025 price level during the holiday season. Data from IntoTheBlock indicates that Shiba Inu faces two key sell walls preventing it from reaching the $0.00003 range. The first resistance zone, between $0.000023 and $0.000024, involves 42,310 addresses holding 60.44 trillion SHIB. Source: IntotheBlock A larger sell wall lies between $0.000024 and $0.000030, where 208,010 addresses purchased 70.35 trillion SHIB. These walls have repeatedly hindered the token’s SHIB price recovery , resulting in pullbacks and sharp declines. Price Consolidation Signals Potential Breakout Shiba Inu price has recently entered a consolidation phase after a volatile period. The token is currently trading within a tight range of $0.00002100 to $0.00002300. Analysts view this consolidation as a potential setup for an upward breakout, especially due to the recent surge in SHIB burn rate and if the broader crypto market shows signs of recovery. SHIB/USD 4-hour price chart (source: TradingView) The token’s recent price action aligns with technical analysis suggesting it has found support at $0.00002. This level has been critical in preventing further declines, even as bearish trends persist. RSI and MACD indicators suggest that SHIB price may be regaining bullish momentum, with RSI currently at 56.81, leaning towards a neutral to slightly bullish outlook. Analyst Predicts 260% Shiba Inu Price Rally Crypto analyst Javon Marks has identified “textbook bull signals” in Shiba Inu’s price chart, suggesting a strong rally may follow. According to Marks, the token recently broke through a long-term resistance trendline and retested it as support during its recent pullback. This breakout behavior often signals the beginning of an upward trend. Marks predicts Shiba Inu price could rise to $0.000081 in the short term, representing a 260% gain from current levels. He also noted the presence of hidden bullish divergence, where price forms higher lows while momentum indicators form lower lows. This pattern indicates underlying strength in the asset. “Shiba Inu is holding above its breakout zone, which is a positive sign for potential growth,” Marks stated in his analysis. Shiba Inu price must overcome two major resistance levels to sustain a bullish rally. The first target is $0.00003, a zone where the token has faced significant selling pressure in previous attempts. If SHIB breaks through this barrier, analysts believe it could reach $0.000081, the next key resistance. Marks also identified a long-term SHIB price target of $0.000155, a price level that represents an unprecedented high for Shiba Inu. He believes this target could be achievable if market conditions improve and broader bullish trends return. The post Analyst Predicts 260% Shiba Inu Price Rally, Here’s Why appeared first on CoinGape .

title: KuCoin Advances the “Menstrual Equity Project”, Benefiting 4,000 Women in the Bahamas
body: NASSAU, Bahamas, Jan. 2, 2025 /PRNewswire/ — On December 31, 2024, the “Menstrual Equity Project”, jointly initiated by KuCoin, Global CSR Foundation, and the American Medical Women’s Association (AMWA), has made new progress. The second batch of aid supplies has been successfully shipped to the Bahamas, providing urgently needed sanitary products for 4,000 local women and effectively improving their quality of life. The “Menstrual Equity Project” aims to offer sustainable menstrual hygiene solutions to marginalized women and girls, aligning with the United Nations’ Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). As the oldest multi-specialty medical organization promoting women’s advancement in the medical field and improving women’s health, AMWA’s mission is in perfect alignment with KuCoin’s commitment to social responsibility. With the support of the Office of the First Lady of Commonwealth of Bahamas H. E. Ann Marie Davis, this round of donated materials focuses on disposable menstrual pads. This decision reflects the local challenges of water scarcity and high washing costs, while also providing essential emergency supplies for women during natural disasters such as hurricanes and typhoons. Since KuCoin made a firm commitment to social welfare initiatives during the “KuCoin Green Future Gala” at the 28th United Nations Climate Change Conference (COP28) in 2023, the company has actively fulfilled its corporate social responsibilities. The “Menstrual Equity Project” has become a key initiative under this commitment. In March 2024, the project’s first phase was implemented, distributing 1,000 menstrual kits—each containing 10 sanitary pads and 2 menstrual cups—to Suriname, St. Jude Children’s Research Hospital, and domestic violence shelters in New York and California. The smooth delivery of the second batch of supplies to the Bahamas will benefit 4,000 women. Jing Zhao Cesarone, President of Global CSR Foundation, commented: “KuCoin has set a remarkable example in addressing period poverty in underserved regions, demonstrating its enthusiasm and dedication to social responsibility.” Nancy Cheung, KuCoin’s Chief Sustainability Officer (CSO), emphasized: “As a global leader in the digital economy, KuCoin is committed to advancing the UN’s Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). Looking ahead, we will continue to focus on key areas such as climate change, health, and education, driving more philanthropic initiatives to fruition. We also plan to expand the scope of the ‘Menstrual Equity Project,’ collaborating with more international organizations to improve women’s living conditions and contribute to global sustainable development.” About KuCoin Founded in 2017, KuCoin is one of the pioneering and most globally recognized technology platforms supporting digital economies, built on a robust foundation of cutting-edge blockchain infrastructure, liquidity solutions, and an exceptional user experience. With a connected user base exceeding 37 million worldwide, KuCoin offers comprehensive digital asset solutions across wallets, trading, wealth management, payments, research, ventures, and AI-powered bots. KuCoin has garnered accolades such as “Best Crypto Apps & Exchanges” by Forbes and has been recognized among the “Top 50 Global Unicorns” by Hurun in 2024. These recognitions reflect its commitment to user-centric principles and core values, which include integrity, accountability, collaboration, and a relentless pursuit of excellence.

title: PEAQ and VANA Go Live on Bithumb: A Big Day for Crypto Traders!
body: The post PEAQ and VANA Go Live on Bithumb: A Big Day for Crypto Traders! appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Bithumb, South Korea’s second-largest crypto exchange, has announced the listing of PEAQ and VANA trading pairs with the Korean Won. The pairs will go live at 4 PM on January 2, 2025. PEAQ, a Layer-1 blockchain, is designed for Decentralized Physical Infrastructure Networks (DePINs), while VANA Network is a decentralized data platform. VANA, the network’s native token, supports transaction fees, staking, and governance. This new listing has created excitement among traders, marking another step forward for innovative blockchain projects in South Korea’s growing crypto market.

title: Analyst Says XRP Looks Amazing, Nothing Has Changed
body: Renowned cryptocurrency analyst Cryptoinsightuk remains confident in XRP’s bullish outlook amid price consolidation. In a tweet, he stated, “Nothing has changed at all with my $XRP thoughts, in fact, $XRP looks amazing. We are just ranging after a 465% move upwards. The oscillators have cooled off, we are just awaiting the next leg to the upside.” $XRP . Nothing has changed at all with my $XRP thoughts, in fact $XRP looks amazing. We are just ranging after a 465% move upwards. The oscillators have cooled off, we are just awaiting the next leg to the upside. pic.twitter.com/Kjv5uq7b4Q — Cryptoinsightuk (@Cryptoinsightuk) December 31, 2024 The analyst’s perspective suggests that XRP’s current consolidation phase is a normal part of the market cycle after its significant upward movement. With technical indicators stabilizing, Cryptoinsightuk believes XRP is preparing for another potential rally. Diverging Opinions on XRP’s Market Dynamics While Cryptoinsightuk remains optimistic, skepticism persists among some market participants. An X user, Arthur Klucznik, commented , “Shit is dropping like a rock. Now wait until Ripple dumps their monthly pile of shit tomorrow.” This remark references the periodic sale of XRP from Ripple’s escrow , a practice some critics argue could create downward pressure on the asset’s price. Despite such concerns, XRP supporters maintain that the broader technical and market trends favor a bullish outcome. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Technical Indicators Signal Potential Upside Adding to Cryptoinsightuk’s analysis, analyst Egrag highlighted the significance of the Williams Alligator Indicator. This tool uses three moving averages—Jaw, Teeth, and Lips—to evaluate market trends. Egrag noted that XRP’s current alignment supports a bullish trajectory, provided the asset remains above the $2 equilibrium zone. Egrag also identified two notable “Break of Structure” (BOS) moments in XRP’s price history. The first occurred in early 2018 when XRP reached its all-time high of over $3.80. The second, in 2021, failed to break the previous record. Egrag now sees a new BOS forming as XRP maintains its position above $2, signaling a potential uptrend continuation. Historical Patterns Bolster Optimism Historical comparisons further reinforce the bullish outlook. The last time the Williams Alligator Indicator displayed a similar alignment was in late 2017, preceding XRP’s surge to its all-time high. XRP could be poised for another significant rally if the current alignment follows a similar trajectory. According to data from CoinMarketCap, XRP is currently trading at $2.09, reflecting a 0.54% increase over the past 24 hours. As the market awaits the next decisive move, analysts like Cryptoinsightuk and Egrag emphasize the asset’s technical strength and potential for further gains. title: Garanti BBVA’s to Provide Crypto Trading Services in Hint of Things to Come
body: Spanish banking giant Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria (BBVA) is deepening its foray into the crypto ecosystem. Garanti BBVA Kripto, a crypto custody platform operated by Garanti BBVA — Turkey’s fifth largest bank, which as of December 2023 was almost 86% owned by BBVA — will soon be providing crypto trading services to the general public. Bit2Me, a crypto exchange founded in Spain in 2014, will be used as the bank’s trading execution center. And now that the Markets in Crypto-Assets (MiCA) regulation is in full effect across the European Union, the partnership between BBVA and the crypto exchange is a strong signal of more things are brewing on the horizon, according to Abel Peña, Bit2Me’s chief sales officer. “I believe in 2025 we are going to see so many banks across Europe offering crypto spot trading to their users,” Peña told CoinDesk. “We are in very close contact with more than 50 financial institutions, with banks all across Europe and internationally, and they will start launching their services in the first quarter of 2025.” BBVA held $857 billion in assets in 2023, making it the 43rd largest bank in the world at the time, and the second biggest in Spain after Banco Santander. While Garanti BBVA Kripto has already been advertising crypto trading services on its website since January 2024, the product was only offered as a pilot and wasn’t available for the general public, according to Bit2Me. BBVA began embracing the crypto industry in Turkey because the regulatory environment allowed it to move earlier, Peña said. Since MiCA finished rolling out on Dec. 30, financial institutions such as BBVA will now be able to secure approval from domestic regulators and offer exposure to bitcoin (BTC), ether (ETH) and other cryptocurrencies to their European customers. “As soon as they have the green light, they will start,” Peña said. “This is from the knowledge that many of them are already integrated with us,” he added, though he declined to disclose the names of the institutions. But why is the banking sector suddenly so enthusiastic about crypto? The regulatory certainty provided by MiCA played a part, Peña said, but U.S. President-elect Donald Trump — who became a vocal crypto supporter in the middle of his campaign, and won big in November — was also a factor. Not to mention the various ideas floating around to get the U.S. government to create a strategic bitcoin reserve. The tremendous success of the U.S. spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds, which have raked in a record $35 billion in inflows in less than a year, certainly didn’t hurt either. “We’re talking about an asset [bitcoin] that many users and companies want to gain exposure to. This is something that banks cannot deny anymore,” Peña said. BBVA isn’t the first European bank to dip its toes into crypto. Deutsche Bank, Germany’s biggest multinational investment bank, is building a rollup on Ethereum using ZKsync technology and has been working on crypto custody and tokenization services with Swiss start-up Taurus since 2023, among other things. French financial services company Société Générale, for its part, has its own crypto arm, called SG-FORGE, which recently announced it will deploy its own euro stablecoin to the XRP Ledger (XRPL) network.

title: Singularity Finance & Crymbo Enable Seamless Compliance For Tokenized AI Economies
body: The post Singularity Finance & Crymbo Enable Seamless Compliance For Tokenized AI Economies appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The AI-powered Layer-2 tokenization network Singularity Finance has taken a key step towards simplifying compliance for real-world assets by partnering with Crymbo . By integrating its infrastructure with Crymbo’s novel unification layer for digital asset compliance, Singularity Finance makes it possible for trading counterparties to share fragmented on- and off-chain transaction data in a secure and trust-minimized way, ensuring adherence with key financial regulations like the FATF Travel Rule . Singularity Finance was created by a merger between SingularityDAO, Cogito Finance and SelfKey, and has built a Layer-2 network for tokenizing assets within the AI economy, including the graphics processing units that power large language models. SingularityDAO provides the necessary financial management expertise, while Cogito handles the actual tokenization process, and SelfKey ensures privacy, compliance and security through its decentralized identity technology. In tokenizing GPUs and other essential AI assets, such as data, Singularity Finance is making the AI economy more liquid and accessible, so that anyone can invest in it. But despite making the AI industry more accessible, compliance still causes headaches for many organizations, preventing their participation. Crymbo has created a decentralized oracle for on- and off-chain compliance data that anyone can validate in real time. It allows tokenized assets to demonstrate full compliance in an immediate, privacy-preserving way. The oracle is designed to enable the secure and seamless transfer of information. All data exchanged between users is encrypted. Only the sender and receiver have access to the data, not even Crymbo itself can view the information. The ability to streamline compliance will go a long way towards speeding up adoption of tokenized RWAs. Because they now have an easy way to prove compliance, it makes RWAs more palatable to financial institutions that must adhere to strict global regulations. Many RWAs require KYC and AML processes to support regulatory compliance, which Crymbo manages for clients while also adhering to privacy standards through its encryption feature. For instance, the FATF Travel Rule is noted as a critical compliance standard created by the Financial Action Task Force, which is a global body that establishes guidelines around anti-money laundering and countering the financing of terrorism rules. The integration eliminates the need for numerous cumbersome processes that were previously required to validate compliance. Traditionally, enterprises would have to connect to multiple technology platforms and send and respond to regular emails in order to demonstrate that everything is above board. But with Crymbo’s oracle, users can leverage the Oracle Explorer to access transaction information, and if both parties are already connected to the oracle, the required information is exchanged automatically, eliminating manual effort and ensuring efficiency. “With Crymbo Oracle, achieving compliance becomes effortless,” a spokesman from Singularity Finance said. “Moreover, it is an upgradeable solution that’s designed to adapt seamlessly as regulations evolve, ensuring your business stays ahead of the curve.”

title: Elon Musk’s X move tanks Kekius Maximus token 60% in an hour; Whale cashes out $2.3M profit
body: Tesla Motors CEO Elon Musk changed his profile name on X to “Kekius Maximus,” and the crypto token by the same name quickly plummeted by 60% within an hour. Soon after Elon Musk adopted the new name, KEKIUS whale 0x820…31cc sold his bags, contributing immensely to the token’s loss. The whale, however, has earned a $2.3 million profit from the token. Elon Musk updated his X profile name to “Kekius Maximus” Elon Musk took the name “Kekius Maximus” on X Tuesday and changed his profile image to the character Pepe the Frog in Roman attire, holding a game pad. "I am Kekius Maximus, CEO of Tesla, SpaceX, and X, servant to the vision of human progress. Father of many innovations, husband to the idea of interplanetary life. And I will achieve my goals, in this era or the next." @elonmusk 🤣🤣 pic.twitter.com/ALdsceaaSY — Tesla Owners Silicon Valley (@teslaownersSV) December 31, 2024 Several commentaries have emerged regarding Elon Musk’s handle change, particularly due to the association of the name “Kekius” and the Pepe character with far-right groups. Some suggested he may have intended it as a joke, while others hinted at possible hidden meanings to the change. However, Musk has yet to give a direct explanation about his profile alterations. The term ‘Kekius’ appears to have been coined from the Latin “Kek,” which connotes laughter. Moreover, ‘Kek’ is said to be an ancient Egyptian god of darkness with a frog’s head. ‘Maximus’ is related to the character played by Russell Crow in the movie Gladiator, Maximus Decimus Meridius. Musk’s X name update caused the KEKIUS token to pump Soon after Musk updated his profile name, the value of the memecoin Kekius Maximus shot up. As of Tuesday evening, the memecoin’s value had surged by more than 900%; however, at the time, it was not immediately clear if Musk’s move had caused the price rise. However, the KEKIUS whale ‘0x820168e15ec0c16cd757257399519429eb2b31cc’ began selling his assets, triggering a 60% drop in the token’s prices in just one hour. The whale has received $2.3 million in profits, with a 40% win rate. The KEKIUS token is currently priced at $0.001399 , an 83% loss in the last 24 hours. Its 24-hour trading volume is also down by 70%, at only $1.48 million, with some tying the drop to Elon Musk’s profile change. Land a High-Paying Web3 Job in 90 Days: The Ultimate Roadmap

title: Next Big Cryptos to Explode Why Whales Believe Solana, Lightchain AI, Ripple , and Ethereum Could Skyrocket This Bull Market
body: The post Next Big Cryptos to Explode Why Whales Believe Solana, Lightchain AI, Ripple , and Ethereum Could Skyrocket This Bull Market appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News As the cryptocurrency market heats up, whales—those with significant buying power—are positioning themselves in projects poised for explosive growth. Among their top picks are Solana (SOL), Lightchain AI , Ripple (XRP), and Ethereum (ETH). Each of these projects offers unique strengths, from scalability to innovation, making them stand out as potential leaders in the upcoming bull market. Solana (SOL) Scalability That Drives Adoption Solana is causing big changes in the blockchain area, and its key tool is growth. By mixing Proof of History (PoH) with Proof of Stake (͏PoS), Solana gives quick speeds, handling many deals each second with small costs. It’s no surprise that builders are rushing to create decentralized apps (dApps) and DeFi answers on the platform. With a rising system, new tools, and a love for change, Solana has put itself as a main spot for blockchain fans. But its not all easy—problems like network breaks and central worries still bring doubt. Fixing these troubles will be key to making lasting growth and trust in the group. Even with the bumps, Solana’s strong aim for growth makes it a top player in blockchain tech helping to form the future of use and new ideas Lightchain AI AI-Blockchain Fusion Attracting Whales Artificial Intelligence (AI) is set to transform industries, and by combining AI with blockchain, this token is positioned to tap into two fast-growing markets. With rising demand for AI solutions, the token benefits from AI-powered decentralized applications (dApps) and blockchain automation. Features like AIVM and PoI create opportunities in sectors like decentralized finance (DeFi) and AI governance. A clear roadmap, including the mainnet launch and AI-driven dApp rollouts, highlights the project’s focus on growth. A growing community of investors is also building momentum, and as awareness of its innovation spreads, broader adoption is expected. Ripple (XRP) And Ethereum (ETH) Timeless Giants Ripple (XRP) and Ethereum (ETH) are prominent cryptocurrencies, each serving distinct purposes within the blockchain ecosystem. Ethereum, introduced in 2015 by Vitalik Buterin, is a decentralized platform that enables the creation of smart contracts and decentralized applications (dApps), positioning itself as a pioneer in decentralized finance (DeFi) and non-fungible tokens (NFTs). Conversely, Ripple, launched in 2012 by Ripple Labs, focuses on facilitating fast and cost-effective cross-border payments. It aims to revolutionize international money transfers by partnering with financial institutions. While Ethereum’s versatility has led to widespread adoption in various sectors. Ripple’s emphasis on efficient global transactions has garnered significant attention from banks and payment providers. Rexas Finance (RXS): transforming DeFi and real estate Transforming decentralized finance (DeFi) and real estate tokenization, Rexas Finance (RXS) is a breakthrough blockchain-based platform that tokenizes actual assets like property using cutting-edge technologies. This gives customers quick, safe, and open financial services. Rexas Finance , currently in its 11th presale round at $0.175, has sold more than 382.4 million tokens and already raised over $33.5 million. Rexas Finance distinguishes itself from other initiatives by emphasizing closing the distance between blockchain technologies and conventional real-world assets. Rexas Finance lets anyone purchase, sell, and trade real estate (worth $379.7 trillion), gold ($121.2 trillion), and art ($65 billion yearly), therefore enabling anyone to do so with simplicity and security. The program lets individuals hold fractional shares of valuable assets, thus creating investment prospects once only available to the privileged. Anyone can tokenize assets using the easy Rexas Token Builder on the platform without any technical knowledge. Users of the Rexas Launchpad can also enable others to donate money for their tokens. Supporting several criteria, including ERC-20, ERC-721, and ERC-1155, Rexas Finance guarantees adaptability and general fit. Rexas Finance, listed on CoinMarketCap and CoinGecko, also passed an audit by Certik, demonstrating its dependability and security consciousness. Currently running a $1 million giveaway, the platform offers 20 participants $50,000 worth of tokens per. These benchmarks and its fresh DeFi strategy help Rexas Finance to be a top contender for exploding in value following the XRP ETF release. Sui: enhancing Web3 user experience Sui is a layer-1 blockchain platform designed to address the problems with current blockchain systems. Its object-centric data format and safe Move computer language ensure unmatched security and scalability. Sui is easy to use, and its new features, such as zkLogin and customizable transaction blocks, eliminate the usual blockchain problems. As of this writing, Sui was worth $4.53, but its focus on global acceptance and user experience will likely make it much more valuable as the crypto market grows. Toncoin (TON): a blockchain of blockchains With its creative sharding mechanism, which divides its blockchain into several subnets to enable many concurrent transactions, Toncoin distinguishes itself. With this scalable and efficient architecture, TON is positioned as a blockchain of blockchains, capable of managing almost unlimited ultra-fast transactions. TON’s sophisticated design ensures it remains a pillar of the developing blockchain scene, even at $5.95 as of writing. TON’s multi-level capabilities could propel institutional interest in cryptocurrencies to unprecedented levels as post-XRP ETF clearance speeds forward. VeChain (VET): real-world blockchain applications VeChain Thor (VET) is a pioneering IoT and blockchain platform to address enterprise-level data problems. Due to its two-token approach, which uses VET as a store of value and VTHO for gas taxes, companies are encouraged to adopt it. VeChain’s enterprise-grade solutions in sustainability, healthcare, and logistics make blockchain a significant factor in its adoption. As of writing, its live price is $0.05. The predicted flood of institutional investor money could see VeChain’s market cap skyrocket in 2025 and utility soar. Kaspa (KAS): the future of proof-of-work Using the GHOSTDAG technique, Kaspa is a proof-of-work (PoW) Bitcoin that allows blocks generated in parallel to coexist instead of becoming orphans. Thus, Kaspa can handle near-instant confirmations and significant block rates. As of this writing, Kaspa’s blockDAG technology has significantly improved over conventional blockchains at $0.11. As the crypto ecosystem develops in 2025, it is a strong candidate for expansion since it can scale safely while preserving excellent throughput. The introduction of XRP ETFs in 2025 will likely bring about a significant transformation in the cryptocurrency market. Thanks to their creative technologies and robust business cases, tokens like Rexas Finance, Sui, Toncoin, VeChain, and Kaspa are positioned to profit from this momentum. Investors should watch these projects since their potential value could make them among the most-performing assets in the next few years. title: Asia-Pacific markets trade mixed at start of 2025 as China's manufacturing slows
body: Asia-Pacific markets trade mixed on Thursday as several major markets resumed trading after the New Year’s Day holiday. Investors reacted to private survey data showing factory activity in China grew less than expected in December, mirroring an official figure due earlier this week. Japan ( NKY:IND ) market closed. The Japanese yen remained largely unchanged around 157 per dollar on Thursday, amid thin trading volumes as Japan observed the holiday season. China ( SHCOMP ) fell -2.48% on Thursday in post-holiday trading, with the Shanghai Composite falling 1% to around 3,320 and the Shenzhen Component shedding 1.3% to 10,280 as investors reacted to disappointing factory activity data, and the offshore yuan held steady at around 7.30 per dollar, as investors returned from New Year’s holidays. A private survey revealed slower growth in China’s manufacturing sector in December, missing expectations for faster expansion. In response, Chinese authorities announced plans to issue a record 3 trillion yuan ($411 billion) in special treasury bonds in 2025. Meanwhile, traders also took note of President Xi Jinping’s New Year’s address on Tuesday, where he projected China’s 2024 GDP to surpass 130 trillion yuan and outlined plans for more proactive growth policies in 2025. Hong Kong ( HSI ) fell -2.18% to 19,695 on the first trading day in 2025 following a muted activity in the prior session amid steep losses in all sectors. India ( SENSEX ) rose +0.87% to 79,145 in early deals on Thursday, marking the second consecutive session of gains and hitting a two-week high, mainly supported by rises in the auto, tech, and financial services sectors. The HSBC India Manufacturing PMI dropped to 56.4 in December 2024, down from 56.5 in November, and revised lower from an initial estimate of 57.4. Australia ( AS51 ) rose +0.52% rose 0.52% to close at 8,201 on Thursday, kicking off the year with a modest gain as mining and energy stocks benefited from stronger commodity prices. The Australian dollar surged above $0.62 on Thursday, recovering from two-year lows. The Judo Bank Australia Manufacturing PMI fell to 47.8 in December 2024 , down from 49.4 in November, according to final data. The Reserve Bank of Australia’s Index of Commodity Prices dropped 10.7% year-on-year in December, easing slightly from a downwardly revised 10.8% decline in November. The benchmark KOSPI traded nearly flat at around 2,400 points early Thursday, as investors returned from New Year’s holidays. The South Korean won rose around 1,470 per dollar, reversing losses from the previous session but remained near 16-year lows. Investors now assessed the Bank of Korea's monetary policy outlook after Governor Rhee Chang-yong emphasized the need for flexibility and agility in a New Year’s address on Thursday, citing rising political and economic uncertainties. In the U.S., on Tuesday, all three major indexes ended in red with the S&P 500 down 0.4%, the Nasdaq Composite falling 0.1%, and the Dow shedding 30 points. U.S. stock futures: Dow +0.35% ; S&P 500 +0.54% ; Nasdaq +0.72% . Currencies: ( JPY:USD ), ( CNY:USD ), ( AUD:USD ), ( INR:USD ), ( HKD:USD ), ( NZD:USD ). More on Asia: China's manufacturing output slows in December to 50.5, misses expectations Australia's manufacturing downturn deepens in December China's Dec factory activity grows at slower rate for third month, service sector rises most in nine months Japan's December manufacturing PMI fall at slower pace, for sixth straight month BOJ's Dec summary raises expectations of rate hike soon; keeps policy rate steady at 0.25%

title: Renowned Finance Professor Shares the Level He Thinks Bitcoin Price Will Hit in 2025
body: Carol Alexander, a finance professor at the University of Sussex, has made a bold prediction about the future of Bitcoin, predicting that the BTC price could rise to $200,000 by 2025. Speaking to CNBC, Alexander expressed confidence in Bitcoin's continued growth but warned that the high leverage in crypto trading would contribute to significant price swings. “I am more bullish than ever for 2025,” Alexander said, adding that Bitcoin could “easily reach $200,000” by the end of next year. Alexander also predicted that Bitcoin would trade around $150,000 by the summer of 2025, with a potential range of plus or minus $50,000 due to ongoing volatility. Despite his optimistic outlook, Alexander clarified that he does not own Bitcoin. Related News: CEO of Giant Cryptocurrency Company Reveals the Level He Thinks Bitcoin Price Will Hit in 2025 Alexander attributed his bullish stance to the expected regulatory clarity in the US, which he believes will provide significant support to Bitcoin. However, he warned that the absence of stricter regulation on crypto exchanges will continue to increase volatility in the market. The high leverage on crypto trading platforms in particular is expected to cause sharp price swings, with trades amplifying both upward and downward movements in Bitcoin’s value. Alexander has previously demonstrated his ability to accurately predict Bitcoin’s price movements. In 2023, he predicted that Bitcoin would reach $100,000 in 2024. While Alexander’s price targets are optimistic, he noted the ongoing volatility problem in the cryptocurrency market. “There are no signs that volatility is abating,” he said, signaling that investors should be prepared for unpredictable price swings even as Bitcoin’s value rises. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Renowned Finance Professor Shares the Level He Thinks Bitcoin Price Will Hit in 2025

title: 3 cryptos set to make new ATHs in January: XRP, RBLK and HBAR
body: Disclosure: This article does not represent investment advice. The content and materials featured on this page are for educational purposes only. As the crypto market gears up for the 2025 altcoin season, analysts are spotlighting Ripple, Hedera, and Rollblock as top contenders. Table of Contents Rollblock: Transforming the $450b gambling industry Is Ripple breaking the $5 resistance level in 2025? Hedera could become the dark horse of 2025 Is RBLK the best token for 2025? Donald Trump’s presidency ignited a surge in the crypto market, with numerous altcoins reaching new all-time highs. However, the market has since cooled off, preparing for the 2025 altcoin season. Among the many promising cryptocurrencies, analysts are highlighting Ripple, Hedera, and Rollblock as options investors should watch. Here’s why. Rollblock: Transforming the $450b gambling industry Rollblock is poised to be one of the best-performing crypto assets in 2025 due to its innovation in the GambleFi niche. The project combines the traditional iGaming approach with new blockchain technologies to disrupt the traditional casino industry. The GambleFi protocol has already proven itself as a big player in the field, with more than $1.3 million in wagers placed in December alone. A fully licensed and operational platform Rollblock is a fully licensed online gambling provider with over 7,000 casino games, including blackjack, roulette, slots, and poker. All these games are offered under a license issued by Gaming Anjouan. In addition to its license, Rollblock offers a top-notch AI-powered security system and advanced encryption technology, protecting both players and investors. RBLK: Fueling Rollblock’s ecosystem At the heart of Rollblock’s ecosystem is RBLK, the native and utility token. Currently, in its ninth presale stage, analysts forecast a potential 100x return once RBLK hits the market. Each week, up to 30% of Rollblock’s revenue is directed towards buying RBLK from the open market. From that sum, 60% of the tokens are burned to create a deficit of supply on the market. The rest is used for staking rewards. This mechanism makes RBLK deflationary, setting the project up for long-term success. You might also like: When to sell: Cycle top price forecasts for XRP, Solana and Rollblock Is Ripple breaking the $5 resistance level in 2025? Ripple has dropped 30% from its December 3 peak of $2.90 but has had a 4% rise in the last 24 hours. The increase follows a stronger U.S. dollar. XRP’s trading volume reached $4.5 billion, highlighting significant selling pressure, with $173 million in liquidations, including $7 million in Ripple longs. The broader market downturn saw Bitcoin fall 12.6% this week to $93,700 and Ethereum drop 15.5% to $3,337. Meanwhile, the U.S. Dollar Index (DXY) surged to 108.5, adding pressure on dollar-denominated assets like Ripple. Ripple is now testing key support levels at $2.0–$1.96, with resistance at $2.5. A breakout above this level could lead to a sharp rise to $4–$5. With an RSI of 57.23, the market is neutral but ripe for a short-term rebound. Analysts remain optimistic about XRP’s future. With legal issues potentially behind it and growing institutional adoption, Ripple is expected to hit $5 by late 2025, with even more upside if market sentiment improves. Hedera could become the dark horse of 2025 Currently trading at $0.2924, Hedera has surged 13% in the past 30 days, reflecting strong market interest. Analysts are predicting a target of $1.00, with a potential for $5.00 by late 2025, driven by increasing institutional support and the possibility of ETF approval. Hedera’s technical indicators show a strengthening uptrend, with a neutral RSI at 47. Analysts foresee resistance at $0.31 and $0.37, with key support at $0.27. Given the ongoing growth, successful ETF rumors and potential for further partnerships, Hedera is well-positioned for significant price appreciation. As adoption accelerates, Hedera could see a strong rally, reaching $5 by 2025 as more institutions and sectors integrate Hedera’s cutting-edge solutions. Is RBLK the best token for 2025? While cryptocurrencies like Hedera and Ripple have already delivered strong results in 2024, 2025 may belong to Rollblock. Unlike many tokens, Rollblock offers more than just capital gains, it allows investors to tap directly into the $750 billion gambling market through a staking mechanism. With RBLK tokens priced at just $0.044, now is the time to take advantage of this opportunity before prices rise in the coming weeks. To learn more about Rollblock, visit the website and socials. The crypto market has entered 2025 with optimism, fueled by predictions of a potential bull market under President-elect Donald Trump. title: Ripple Releases $1 Billion in Tokens on New Year’s Eve, Mysterious Trump Memo Raises Eyebrows
body: The post Ripple Releases $1 Billion in Tokens on New Year’s Eve, Mysterious Trump Memo Raises Eyebrows appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News On New Year’s Day, Ripple released 500 million XRP tokens from its escrow account, in line with its monthly plan. This release, totaling over $1 billion in value, highlights the ongoing strategy Ripple has in place to distribute XRP over time. However, this massive release was accompanied with a memo which read, “January 20th is around the corner. Donald Trump will be in the WH, and we are going to make crypto great again!” The upcoming inauguration could provide a catalyst for further price action, potentially leading to a strong rally. XRP Price Reacts: The price of XRP has already seen an 11% surge, with a positive Buy signal on the indicators, suggesting that the bullish trend will continue throughout the month. The overall market is also showing signs of recovery, adding to the optimism surrounding XRP. XRP is currently trading at $2.35 and is now aiming to hit the $2.50 mark. While December is often a time of market corrections, January and beyond look much more promising for XRP and other cryptocurrencies. The market saw rapid fluctuations, with major coins like Bitcoin and XRP experiencing sharp pumps and sudden drops, but now that we’ve entered January, the outlook is bullish. A key factor is the expected regulatory changes for crypto, with President Trump’s administration likely to introduce crypto-friendly policies. The launch of several altcoin ETFs—including for XRP—could fuel massive market growth in the coming months.

title: Payment Tokens XRP and XLM Surge in New Year Altcoin Rally
body: The Ripple cross-border payment token has climbed almost 15% over the past 24 hours, hitting an intraday high of $2.44 during early trading in Asia on Jan. 2. It is the highest XRP has been since mid-December, as payment coins lead the way into the new year. The Ripple token exploded to top $2.90 in a seven-year high in early December but had fallen back to dip at $2 by the end of the month. “Momentum and increased focus on real-world utility continues to build,” said CEO Brad Garlinghouse on Jan. 1. just smash the LIKE button if you are HOLDING $XRP ! pic.twitter.com/Ynqf6qWvjx — Oscar Ramos (@realOscarRamos1) January 2, 2025 Altcoins Lead Into 2025 Also on New Year’s Day, community member ‘Jack the Rippler’ observed that the fintech firm has released its monthly 500 million XRP from escrow, “but with an interesting note!” The memo in the transaction stated, “January 20 is around the corner,” “Donald Trump will be in the White House, and we are going to make crypto great again.” There have been a lot of unsubstantiated rumors about Ripple working closely with the new Trump administration. He also noted that XRP “broke out from a descending triangle and is ready for $3!” BREAKING: @Ripple has released its monthly 500 million #XRP from escrow, but with an interesting note! pic.twitter.com/mQ4WqZ69Gh — JackTheRippler © (@RippleXrpie) January 1, 2025 Ripple’s sibling, which was forked from the chain, Stellar Lumens (XLM), was also performing well, as it usually mirrors XRP momentum. XLM has surged 28% on the day, hitting an intraday high of $0.456 during the Thursday morning Asian trading session. Stellar spiked to over $0.60 in late November, but it still remains down 50% from its 2018 all-time high. Cardano (ADA) is also performing well today with a 10% gain to reach $0.95, its highest price for a fortnight. Other altcoin gainers include Avalanche (AVAX), Chainlink (LINK), and Hedera (HBAR). Bitcoin Consolidation Continues Bitcoin has made just 1.3% over the past day to top $95,000 during Thursday morning trading. The asset has remained in consolidation since its fall below $100,000 in mid-December. BTC dominance is currently at 57.44%, dropping 7% since its multi-year high of almost 62% in late November when it was rallying hard. Some analysts believe that a big altcoin rally will occur in the first three months of 2025, and this could be at the expense of BTC if capital is rotated into alts. The biggest Altcoin rally will happen in Q1 #Altseason is coming pic.twitter.com/9uiwKi2OZJ — Elja (@Eljaboom) January 1, 2025 The post Payment Tokens XRP and XLM Surge in New Year Altcoin Rally appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Celsius Appeals Court Ruling Against $444 Million In FTX Claims
body: The post Celsius Appeals Court Ruling Against $444 Million In FTX Claims appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Celsius, the defunct crypto lender, has filed an appeal against a court ruling that dismissed its claims for damages from FTX. This move comes as part of its ongoing bankruptcy process, where Celsius seeks to recover significant funds while dealing with past missteps. The Claims Against FTX Celsius originally sought $2 billion, blaming FTX for making false statements that allegedly worsened its financial problems. Later, the claim was revised to $444 million, focusing on “preferential transfers” arguing that certain transactions unfairly benefited specific creditors. Celsius filed a Notice of Appeal against Judge Dorsey's ruling for FTX debtor Elected for Appeal to be heard in the District Court Facts 1) Celsius Filed a $2bn claim for disparagement before the bar date 2) Celsius filed a $444m amended claim for a preference claim after bar… pic.twitter.com/evaBzMi5Lt — Sunil (FTX Creditor Champion) (@sunil_trades) January 1, 2025 In December, Judge John Dorsey dismissed both claims in December, saying Celsius failed to provide enough proof. He also criticized the company for improperly filing changes to its claims in July 2024 without seeking permission. The court ruled these changes were unrelated to the original claims and would disrupt FTX’s restructuring. Paying Back Creditors Despite legal challenges, Celsius has worked to repay its creditors. In August, it returned $2.53 billion to over 250,000 creditors, covering around two-thirds of the claims. In November, it announced another $127 million payout from its recovery funds. These efforts briefly boosted the value of Celsius’s native token (CEL), which surged 350% to $0.56 in September. However, the price dropped to $0.1960 . Legal Troubles for the Founder Adding to Celsius’s challenges, its founder, Alex Mashinsky, pleaded guilty last month to fraud and manipulation of the CEL token. He faces a potential 20-year prison sentence, with sentencing scheduled for April 2025. What’s Next for Celsius? Celsius’s appeal aims to overturn the court’s dismissal of its claims against FTX. While it continues to navigate bankruptcy proceedings, the case highlights the risks and complexities in the crypto industry. For now, Celsius faces an uphill battle to recover its reputation and secure fair outcomes for its creditors.

title: Hong Kong’s Yuxing Technology Acquires 78.2 Bitcoin for $6.3M
body: The post Hong Kong’s Yuxing Technology Acquires 78.2 Bitcoin for $6.3M appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Yuxing Technology, a publicly listed company in Hong Kong, has made significant moves in the cryptocurrency market . Between July 25 and December 31, 2024, the company purchased 78.2 Bitcoin at an average price of $80,960 per unit, totaling $6.3 million. In order to fund this purchase, Yuxing has to sell 6.3 million USDT at an average price of $1 per unit. The USDT proceeds were directly converted into Bitcoin, which shows how confident the firm is in crypto assets. Bitcoin is slightly out of focus from its last $100K mark and currently trading around $95K, though the market is bullish that it will get an upward boost this year with industry support. Hong Kong’s Yuxing Technologies acquires 78.2 $BTC for $6.3M, expanding its Bitcoin holdings. pic.twitter.com/hk3plvG2Po — cryptothedoggy (@cryptothedoggy) January 2, 2025 Proposal to Add Bitcoin to Hong Kong’s Reserves In a related development, Wu Jiexhuang, a member of Hong Kong’s Legislative Council and chairman of the Web3 Virtual Asset Development Subcommittee, suggested that Bitcoin should be included in the region’s financial reserves. According to him it is a strategic move to bring financial stability to the country and will reduce dependency on traditional assets. Jiexhuang highlighted the importance of leveraging Hong Kong’s “one country, two systems” framework to explore innovative financial strategies. He claimed that if major economies in the world start adding Bitcoin to their reserves, its value will stabilize, encouraging other countries to follow suit. Hence as an outcome, it will actually drop the value of traditional assets, impacting government reserves tied to those assets. Institutions are betting big on Bitcoin as it soars! Read Bitcoin price prediction to see how the bullish market could push it to new heights! Efforts to Enhance Crypto Infrastructure To stay ahead in the crypto game, The Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing Limited (HKEX) launched a Virtual Asset Index Series earlier this year. This index will provide a reliable price benchmark that will be set for Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) pricing in Asia, to address the global price fluctuations. Moreover, Hong Kong regulators are also about to finalize licensing for several crypto exchanges , including Crypto.com which shows the region’s commitment to become the fintech crypto hub in the world.
